testcase.classname: To Validate New User registration for a Elearning App
testcase.name: New user registration
testcase.system-out: Given user is in registration page..........................................passed And user enters firstname "Nisha3"..........................................passed And user enters lastname "Menon"............................................passed And user enters e-mail id "nishamenon4@hotmail.com".........................passed And user enters username "nishamenon3"......................................passed And user enters password "nishamenon3123"...................................passed And user confirms the password "nishamenon3123".............................passed When user clicks on register button.........................................passed Then user sees the confirmation message "Nisha3 Menon"......................passed And user navigates to HomePage..............................................passed Then user click on compose..................................................passed And user enters recipient email "rvasudevan"................................passed And user enters subject "Test Email1".......................................passed And user enters enters message..............................................passed When user clicks on send message button.....................................passed Then user sees success message "The message has been sent to"...............passed When user tries to logout...................................................passed Then user is logged out.....................................................passed
